name: Greedy Dice is Mortal
description:
Survive the onslaught, but don't get greedy!

Greedy Dice is Mortal is a top-down shooter where you play as a greedy little dice clinging onto life.

Your health is constantly draining, but killing enemies heals you! 

Change your face from the numbers 1-6 for increased damage, AND BIG EXPLOSIONS.

But wait! There's a catch! The higher your face number, the quicker your health drains!

How long can YOU survive??

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim, left click to shoot
  • Q / E or mouse wheel to change faces

Music by Ahmed Al Salman https://www.youtube.com/c/LetsPlaytest/ @LetsPlaytest

Design, code, art, and SFX by Faisal Kubba @fdkubba faisalkubba.com

SFX synthesized in Bfxr
